instructions: Open Settings and tap General . Tap Accessibility . Under the Vision heading, select Reduce Motion . Tap the Reduce Motion toggle to on (green).
Open Settings . Tap Battery . Tap the Low Power Mode toggle to on (green).

Open Settings and tap Wallpaper . Tap Choose a New Wallpaper . Browse through the included options, or select a picture from your Camera Roll to find the wallpaper you want. Once you've chosen the image you want, tap Still at the bottom of the screen. Then, tap Set and choose whether you want this picture as your Lock Screen, Home Screen, or both.
